TopicTitle: When did you get repped for the first time?

Articles.Content:
Hello, forums! Joining the forums and getting our first reputation comment is a momentous experience for us, and gets more and more "part of the routine" the more you get.

My question for today is: was what were your first reputation comments about?

Mine was given by someone I've never seen too frequently (Of course I remember his name, but I can't mention it) , about a comment I posted about Why I Play KSP - His statement was: "Wow, that was an excellent comment." That honestly made me squee. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) If you're reading this (You know who you are ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)) you're awesome. That was around my seventh post in the forums, so I thought for a time that you got green bars once you're no longer a Curious George. 

What about you guys?
Is there a way to see older rep?
..None that I know of, I just remembered it ever since. ![:blush:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_embarrassed.gif)

I have no idea.

It was too long ago. XD
I honestly have no idea. And I am very sure it can't be retraced since my original account was lost in the big April massacre.

> 
> I have no idea.
> It was too long ago. XD

What he said. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Red Iron Crow would know. (Maybe any other mod as well)
It was a Space Shuttle I made back in February.
I know it was for my first craft, but I don't remember who did it.
I dont remember at all. Is there any way to find out?

Zekes repped my company thread.

that was my first +rep ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

(I've tried to rep zekes in return a crapload)

Moderators can see the full history of a user's received reputation comments, though oddly we can't see which post it was given to. I'll look it up for anyone who asks after this post and share the findings here (I don't want to assume the idle curiosity in previous posts means people want it shared publicly).

My first rep ever received was in Feb 2014, for sharing my views on whether MechJeb is cheating. (The more things change, the more they stay the same. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif))

Also: Red Iron Crow? Really, Starwipe? ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

I believe my first rep was received while stating my opinion of the **AWFUL** decision SQUAD made to use Cursed as their new mod repository and drop the Spaceport2 they'd been working on for quite some time.

> 
> I dont remember at all. Is there any way to find out?

Same here. No idea at all, I probably missed it due to not paying attention to rep or notifications much then.
IÃ‚Â´m not entirely sure, but I think I got my first rep for a name suggestion in [this](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/97025-Python-class-Combat-Command-Ship) thread. Thanks gGATORr!

> Also: Red Iron Crow? Really, Starwipe? ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

What has this world come to? Banamonde come look at this!

EDIT: just gonna drop this here... [Misspell the username forum game!](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/128128-Misspell-the-Username%21?p=2067070#post2067070)

> 
> I'm also interested in mine. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

As a fellow mad scientist, I find myself curious as well. 

Usually my curiosity leads to explosions and screaming kerbals. I hope this ends the same way.
It was when i made my first mod, And got slapped on the wrist (Metaphorically! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)) because i didnt know the rules.

First reps for people that asked:

Starwhip:

Oct 30th, 2013 from allmappedout, No Comment Made.

Mad Rocket Scientist:

Mar 11th, 2015 from DMSP, "Have da Rep+"

Xacktar:

Oct 18th, 2013 from Jeremy Pili, "Very nice camera work there!"

> 
> Starwhip:
> Oct 30th, 2013 from allmappedout, No Comment Made.

Hmm... I vaguely remember that. It might have been my welcome aboard post.
I think my first rep was for [this post](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/42877-CPU-Performance-Database?p=907888&viewfull=1#post907888) in the CPU performance database thread...
I think it was probably for one of the flags I posted in either the show your flag or request a flag thread shortly after flag planting was introduced.

> 
> Xacktar:
> 
> Oct 18th, 2013 from Jeremy Pili, "Very nice camera work there!"

Interesting, must have been a video post I guess. Thanks, RIC.
